creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Theodore W. Bennett
markings:
On verso: masking tape [MIA 159-58]; masking tape [L61-26 lent to MIA by T. Bennett]; MIA loan label [L58.621 Rosenberg and Stiebel]. Verso is cradled.

title: Landscape with Peasants
